nodes.text: A Chiss female served as a shuttle pilot for Supreme General Ba'kif and Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Ascendancy when the two investigated the wreckage of a refugee starship that suffered an attack in the Dioya system. The pilot had been a member of the crew on the patrol ship that initially witnessed the attack two days prior. As the patrol ship approached, the attacker—unknown to the Chiss, the Nikardun Destiny—retreated into hyperspace.
